articles.author: Tumaini Carayol
articles.title: Hobbled Rafael Nadal ‘mentally destroyed’ after Australian Open defeat - The Guardian
articles.description: An injury-hampered Rafael Nadal’s Australian Open title defence ended with defeat in straight sets to the American Mackenzie McDonald
articles.content: Rafael Nadal returned to the Australian Open this year in the midst of one of the leanest periods of form in his career, charged with racing against the clock to find confidence and feel against riva… [+5286 chars]

articles.title: Clearly hampered Nadal loses in second round of Australian Open - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Top-seeded Rafael Nadal is out of the Australian Open after a second-round loss. Unseeded American Mackenzie McDonald beat a hobbling Nadal 6-4, 6-4, 7-5 on Wednesday.
articles.content: No. 1 seed Rafael Nadal was shockingly upset by unranked American MacKenzie McDonald in the second round of the Australian Open, losing in straight sets (6-4, 6-4, 7-5).

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Defending champion Nadal knocked out of Australian Open - News24
articles.description: Defending champion and top seed Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset.
articles.content:
Defending champion Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset on Wednesday, his worst Grand Slam result in seven years.
